answers.author: Lynne Scott
answers.text:
Hello Ms. Wallace, the 2011 Award recipient list can be found at http://icma.org/en/icma/members/awards/annual_awards - click on the highlighted text 'Recipients Announced" in the sentence: 2011 Annual Award Recipients Announced-Will Be Honored In Milwaukee - I have also attached the file to this response.

author: Jeannelle Wallace
text: I am looking for the awardee list - where can I find this information?
title: ICMA Conference in Milwaukee
